0: I actually slept with my windows open since the weather is perfect

In fact I was so impressed with Andaz that when I found out there is an Andaz in San Diego I decided to book there even though I can find less expensive choice in the same Gaslamp area in same category
The room had peeling wall paper and the doorways were very chipped and damaged
I did not like the loud club music at the pool and would have preferred a more mellow quieter vibe up there
He asked me what size they were and 2 days later when we came down for an outing they handed my husband an exact replica same brand and color brand new
I do not recommend you get those rooms because they are dark humid and face the other room which is a little too close for comfort
If you are a business traveler however there are a few things in how the rooms and hotels are set up that just fail to provide the amenities and convenience you are looking for while on the road
Could the walls and windows be any thinner
The shower did have a curtain you could close to the room but do not expect full privacy
1: Staff were pleasant and gracious but did not go above normal service a disappointment for an Andaz hotel
Good upgrade good location gets a bit noisey but overall a popping hotel
Quick one day night get away for the wife and I Great location with friendly staff
Cool modern decor on the interior
The rooftop bar has nice drinks and wifi so you can stare at your tablet
The location was great as going to convention center and was easy to walk to
The rooms are well decorated with upscale finishes
